summary: Drag Becomes Him provides an intimate glimpse inside the life of internationally acclaimed drag performer Jinkx Monsoon.
cast: Jerick Hoffer|Benjimen Blair|Zan Gibbs|Deanne Hoffer|Jacob Hoffer|Melissa Hoffer|Kevin Kauer|Marc Kenison|Kenneth Lee|Brian Peters|RuPaul|Amanda Russel|Nick Sahoyah|Jessie Underhill|Michelle Visage|Jason Wikander|Jeremy Wikander
title: Drag Becomes Him
